resources.string:
Description 
 
 If a mobile application enters the international market, 
 he needs localization for different languages. 
 
 Create a page with the following elements: 
 
 Spinner with a list of languages - Russian and English. 
 
 OK button. By clicking on this button, the language is switched throughout the application. 
 Add text on the page to display in English and Russian.
